thread.title: Greece sees no issues in paying July public sector salaries
thread.title_full: Greece sees no issues in paying July public sector salaries | Reuters

author: Reuters
title: Greece sees no issues in paying July public sector salaries
text:
ATHENS, July 7 Greece sees no issues in being able to pay public sector salaries in July, Deputy Finance Minister Dimitris Mardas said on Tuesday.
"We are not facing any particular problem in paying public sector salaries (on July 13)," Mardas told state TV ERT. "Based on what we know so far, they can be paid normally."
Mardas stressed again that the Greek government was not making plans for a haircut on bank deposits. (Reporting by George Georgiopoulos; Writing by Matt Robinson)
